hackathon-description-text: Northumbrian Water operate over £11bn in assets across the United Kingdom.  We are currently seeking to evidence the potential of investing in a new asset management systems and processes.  We are organising an exciting hackathon to bring together software developers, and entrepreneurs to demonstrate the potential value of the investment, and create new solutions to improve  asset management data insight.
hackathon-eligibility:
Develop your project at the Cloud Innovation Centre, submit project through Devpost, and participate in the Monday 1st pitching and judging. In order to be eligible for prizes, you must
Individuals (over 18 years in age); Teams; Organizations (up to 100 employees)
United Kingdom

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Best most impactful evidence relating to the three specific challenge areas identified.
Prizes provided for best solution in challenge classes.

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=Bath Ln, Newcastle upon Tyne, Tyne and Wear NE4, UK

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion:
Usefulness in evidencing benefits of asset management investment

How does hack support effective evidence of the need to invest in new asset data management systems

Practicality in application
 How useful is the hack in its intended real world situation.

Completion of evidence solution
 How complete or polished the hack is.
How polished and impressive is the presentation of the hack.
How well-designed is the hack, paying attention to user experience and user interface

hackathon-location-address: Bath Ln, Newcastle upon Tyne, Tyne and Wear NE4, UK
hackathon-description-header: Help a water utility to demonstrate potential to improve performance through enhanced asset data management
